body.p:
Batavia Ohio
Sept 9th 1862
Gov. Robinson
Dear Sir

For the first time in my life I apply for a position -- I am aware it is usual to obtain such things through the intercession & recommendation of others, but I have resolved to act for my self in view of your acquaintance with me -- I am compelled with my family to leave home in
consequence of the Rebels having our Country in posession -- And If the President in accordance with our request agrees that some citizens of Kentucky may be associated with Judge Hitchcock in the trial of Prisoners at "Camp Chase" I would be glad under the circumstances to have the appointment -- If you should
confer the appointment upon me I will & shall feel deeply grateful --

Sincerely your friend
Thornton F. Marshall
